title: Spiced pork loin with black pudding sauce, asparagus, and spiced January King cabbage
description: This pork is marinated for three days for a wonderful spiced flavor, then cooked quickly in a pressure cooker.
ingredients: 1 large parsnip, peeled and cut into large dice
600ml/21fl oz chicken stock, plus extra for the gravy
4 pieces deep-fried pork rind, to garnish
